name: K-1 Ouja ni Narou! King of Kings
overview: K-1 Ouja ni Narou! is a kickboxing game in which the player can create, customize (edit hair, face, weight, skin, clothes, etc) or choose a default player to compete in different kind of tournaments. The gameplay is that the player can choose what he wants his fighter to train during the weeks (shadowboxing in front of a mirror, skipping rope, calisthenics and jogging every day, weightlifting, fight againts an sparring, etc.) to increase his stats and them try to win the tournaments. For that he will have different fights to climb in the charts and finally fight for the championship. The game features different camera angles, different game modes, a third person perspective & is also PocketStation compatible.
